branchCategory.name: Spark Resistant Tubing
branchCategory.description: <p>Flame resistance double layer tubing is suitable for air and water piping in environments where sparks from spot welders, etc., may be a problem. The double layer design uses a flame resistant resin (equivalent to UL-94 Standard V-0) for the outer layer.</p>

branchItem.name: TRB
branchItem.description: <P>Series TRB flame resistance double layer tubing is suitable for air and water piping in environments where sparks from spot welders, etc., may be a problem. The double layer design uses a flame resistant resin (equivalent to UL-94 Standard V-0) for the outer layer. The TRB series is available in a variety of colors. 100m roll is available for all color types. </P>

branchItem.name: TRTU
branchItem.description: <P>Series TRTU flame resistance three-layer tubing is suitable for air and water piping in environments where sparks from arc welders, etc., may be a problem.  The three-layer design uses a flame resistant polyolefin (equivalent to UL-94 Standard V-0) for the outer area.  The TRTU series is available in a variety of colors and sizes and is RoHS compliant.</P> <P> </P>
